7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) said: 'Bilal calls the Adhan during the night, so eat and drink until Ibn Umm Maktum calls the Adhan." She said: "And there was no more between than the time it takes for one to come down and the other to go up

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُؤَذِّنَانِ جَمِيعًا أَوْ فُرَادَى
chapter.eng-name: Should They Call The Adhan Together or Separately?
